website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful looking American-style chest designed for watchmakers and other owners of fine precision tools. It offers lots of versatile storage.
pros: Rosewood finish gives a high-quality appearance, as do chromed latches and handles
Drawers are felt lined to provide protective storage for delicate instruments
cons: A replica of traditional cabinets, but imported and lacking the brand’s original handmade quality

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: It has the Gerstner name and it is made in China.
customer_reviews.author: JimP

customer_reviews.title: International means what you think it does
customer_reviews.text: Without putting it on a neon sign Gerstner is very honest in marketing this as a made in China for Gerstner product. That means it is not of the quality that their two thousand dollar made in USA boxes are. That being said it is a great tool box for my machinist tools. I don't ask it to be carried around and hauled in my truck, but for stationary service in my tiny hobbyist machine shop it serves well and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: BMoore

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the selling price. The chest arrived with the front left corner joint loose, the glue let loose. There was no damage just a loose corner joint and the support between the drawers was loose too. Instead of returning it a little glue and a couple clamps fixed it up perfectly. Normally I would have returned the item but if too many people complain and return items such as this they will disappear from the market. I applaud Gerstner for offering a decent chest at a price point where hobbiests can buy. Would definitely buy another Gerstner International product.
customer_reviews.author: phil

customer_reviews.title: Not handmade, imported. Excellent value though!  Keep in mind the handmade ones are $2,000.+
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful toolbox! Could be displayed as furniture. Heirloom quality Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Arthur M.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: A good quality tool chest with rather loose fitting tolerances. Would have preferred the US built chest but it costs 1000+ bucks more.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Very nicly made.
customer_reviews.text: I do like it but it's not as nice as the ones from Ohio.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Greene

customer_reviews.title: Super nice box
customer_reviews.text: Very nice "MADE IN AMERICA" top quality tool chest. Well worth the price don't bother with those cheap CHEAPLY made Chinese knockoffs you waste your money if you buy those fake boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Pileits

customer_reviews.title: A good product
customer_reviews.text: Though these are not the quality of the tool boxes 10/15 years ago, they are still far above the competition. My only issue with this unit was one of the large drawers stuck when opened. The rear wall of the drawer was not planed down enough. I easily planed it down with a few swipes. But it does show they are not the same as they were. Would I buy one again, yes as it is the best in on the market unless you want to go into the $1000.00 range
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Item!
customer_reviews.text: Liked it so much, I bought a second one two weeks later.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher  Wyland

customer_reviews.title: Best Tool boxes for craftspeople!
customer_reviews.text: These Gerstner tool boxes are fabulous. Well built, look great and store my tools very well.
customer_reviews.author: seaquill

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and well made!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. My husband has been drooling over it since he opened it for Christmas. Literally sitting in my dining room so he can see it everyday. Perfect gift!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and excellent value. Service was fast and arrived unscathed. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: Poorly constructed, made in China, replica of the famous old Gerstner chest.
customer_reviews.author: will hughes

customer_reviews.title: Wooden tool boxes
customer_reviews.text: We bought these wooden toolboxes to use as jewelry boxes. They arrived fast beautifully packaged and are two beautiful pieces to add to my collection. This was a merry Christmas present from my husband and it is made me very merry. I would definitely like to know when you get the T 24 midsize box back in stock!!
customer_reviews.author: catherine jensen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice item to display in your home or office.
customer_reviews.text: You could put tools in it I suppose. Much nicer than you would expect for the price. Last for generations, this box will outlive me and never go out of style.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Same as 80 dollar Harbour Freight model
customer_reviews.text: Same thing at Harbour Freight for 80 bucks. I came here to see if I could find a cheaper one because I liked the look of it. Instead I found one that's 300 dollars more.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.text: I cant justify spending over a thousand dollars on an American made Gerstner, yet. In the meantime this baby does the job and does it beautifully in my honest opinion. I am a leather worker and I keep ALL of my specialty tools in here.
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore

product_meta.title: Gerstner International GI-T24 Red Oak 11-Drawer Top Chest
product_meta.description:
The Gerstner International T24 Oak 11-Drawer Top Chest is an imported, classic American style chest, constructed of American red oak hardwood and red oak veneers. This is a great chest for toolmakers to store their precision tools. It is also suitable for all kinds of home use. This chest is perfect for a multitude of usages ranging from moisture free storage of precision hand tools to hobby storage.

6 medium, 2 narrow and 3 full width drawers provide ample room for storage. The adjustable front lid gives the most practical use of space, covering the eleven drawers in the locked position and stowing neatly beneath them in the open position.

Great for multiple compartmented storage of jewelry, craft items, stamping and stencil tools, watches, pocket and various other collectable knives, artists brushes and paints and any other small items that need neat and organized storage.

The overall dimensions of this chest are:

24" wide x 10" deep (front to back) x 15-7/8" tall.
feature_bullets: Hardwood design provides protection from moisture
Front lid stows under drawers in the open position

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars20 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
